name: Heroes of Might and Magic Online
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic Online
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic Online is a RPG-strategy massively multiplayer game developed by TQ Digital Entertainment and NetDragon Websoft. It came out on 10-05-2010. TQ Digital Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Heroes of Might and Magic Online on PC.
